chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
Puniq: is_true (uniq pts)

Goal:
is_true (cn \in nodes)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
nodes = [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : seq nid
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts |- Type] ?P : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts |- ?A -> Type]
this_not_pts' : forall this : nat_eqType, this == cn -> this \notin pts
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts Puniq : uniq pts |- Type]
mem_cat : forall (T : eqType) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), (x \in s1 ++ s2) = (x \in s1) || (x \in s2)
locCn : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> valid (getLocal n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), getLocal n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (getLocal n d))
in_cons : forall (T : eqType) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), (x \in y :: s) = (x == y) || (x \in s)
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
rot_to_arc : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x y : T), uniq p -> x \in p -> y \in p -> x != y -> rot_to_arc_spec p x y
localCoh = fun n : nid => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> Pred heap
splitPr : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x : T), x \in p -> splitr x p
s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
Transitions.s_safe_in : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.s_safe_inI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), InductiveInv.ProtocolWithInvariant.send_safeI I st this to d m -> this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes p d /\ to \in Protocols.Exports.nodes p d
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
Actions.can_send = fun (p : protocol) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s : state) => (l \in dom s) && (this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes p (getStatelet s l)) : protocol -> nid -> Label -> state -> bool
this_not_pts : forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
getStP_K : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh d) (pf : n \in nodes) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> getLocal n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP C pf = m
getStL : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> Log
getStP : forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh d -> n \in nodes -> PStateT
rot_to : forall (T : eqType) (s : seq_predType T) (x : T), x \in s -> rot_to_spec s x
bigop.mem_index_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in bigop.index_iota m n) = (m <= i < n)
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
cohMsg = fun (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%nat_scope
mem_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in iota m n) = (m <= i < m + n)
